titles.title: 240 Jesus Is All The World To Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
verse 1
Jesus is all
The world to me
My life my joy my all
He is my strength
From day to day
Without Him I would fall

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When I am sad
To Him I go
No other one
Can cheer me so
When I am sad
He makes me glad
He's my friend

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Jesus is all
The world to me
My Friend in trials sore
I go to Him
For blessings and
He gives them o'er and o'er

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
He sends the sunshine
And the rain
He sends the harvest's
Golden grain
Sunshine and rain
Harvest of grain
He's my Friend

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Jesus is all
The world to me
And true to Him I'll be
Oh how could I
This Friend deny
When He's so true to me

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Following Him
I know I'm right
He watches o'er me
Day and night
Following Him
By day and night
He's my Friend

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Jesus is all
The world to me
I want no better friend
I trust Him now
I'll trust Him when
Life's fleeting days shall end

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Beautiful Life
With such a Friend
Beautiful life
That has no end
Eternal life
Eternal joy
He's my Friend
